Description:
Quality Home, Quality Estate, Low Maintenance Living
Located within the highly desired Curlewis Parks community is this brand new four-bedroom home. Tastefully designed and expertly crafted, this spacious Metricon home is situated on the doorstep of some of the Bellarine Peninsula's best wineries, beaches and bays. This fantastic home delivers the greatest of low maintenance living to your feet without compromising on quality or family lifestyle.
Great sized open plan kitchen, living and dining area
Kitchen with stone benchtops, w/in pantry and SS appliances
Spacious master bedroom features w/in robe and ensuite
Three additional bedrooms with b/in robes and shared bathroom
Remote double lock-up garage features internal access
Ducted heating providing comfort throughout
Secure backyard features easy care gardens and side access
Landscaped parks and playgrounds a short walk away
20 minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical Gardens
Internal area
211m²

Description:
LIFES'S WAITING ON THE BELLARINE
You could purchase this lovely parcel of land and start to build immediately as it's already titled. With land selling fast in this part of the world you would be wise to move quickly to secure it for yourself! Measuring 455m2 with a 14m frontage and no estate guidelines to restrict what you build this is the perfect opportunity to create your dream home. All services are available. The Curlewis supermarket complex is just minutes away as are schools and public transport. If fishing is your passion then you'll be pleased to hear the Clifton Springs boat ramp is also minutes away. You will be situated virtually in the center of the Bellarine Peninsula with surf and family beaches aplenty. Think of the lifestyle- it's a move you won't regret.

Description:
Large Family Living
Double door grand entry as you step inside this picture-perfect Porter Davis Family home just 2.5 years young.
Study has plenty of room for a large desk, shelves & street views. Very grand master that is super spacious with a walk-in robe plus en-suite that has his & hers vanities with stone tops, dual shower heads plus niches.
Walking on is internal access from the garage & adjacent the first living area. Flowing on is an enormous light filled living area which is a perfect hub for the family to enjoy! Here is the kitchen, dining & plus another living that has sliding doors out to the undercover alfresco.
Kitchen of quality has stone benches, glass splash back, stainless steel appliances that include a 900mm electric oven, gas 5 burner cook top, range hood & dishwasher plus a huge walk in pantry plus plenty of soft close cupboards & drawers for storage.
Down the hall are big bedrooms 2,3 & 4 which all have built in robes. Central bathroom with a freestanding deep bath, shower & single vanity basins with stone tops. 3rd living area is perfect as a games room or kids retreat. Plus, the laundry which has side yard access.
Outside through Constantine doors is an L shaped undercover deck that has a built-in bar. Still enough yard for the family pet plus a container converted storage shed. Additional features are gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 8.5ft ceilings, some down lights & timber floors all on a generous 580m2 block.
Short drive to the new shopping centre that has a delicious cafe, supermarket, shops & doctors including a 24-hour chemist. Easy access to public transport, local schools, the bay & boat ramp plus award winning wineries, the Bellarine lifestyle awaits you.

Description:
Modern family home.
Just 100m from the parks and reserves, this newly built and smartly designed family home with modern features offers all the comforts you need with loads of hidden extras and the space you desire.
The location is unparalleled with no other new estate across the Bellarine and Surf Coast offering shoreline living, AND with an unmatched affordability in water-fronted property in the region, this is one of the most accessible sea change locations in Victoria.
Curlewis also offers a short trip to a number of the peninsulas best attractions, including a number of quality golf courses, award winning wineries, historical sites and townships, numerous amazing beaches, regular markets, annual events AND Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington Peninsula or Portarlington offering a ferry to the docklands in Melbourne.
Upon entry, you'll find a versatile room which would lend itself to a home office to the right and to the left the main bedroom featuring his and hers walk in robe & private ensuite compete with shower, toilet and a double vanity. Moving through into the heart of the home delivers you into the main activity centre with open plan living, dining and kitchen area complimented by an under roof alfresco creating that ultimate indoor/outdoor entertainment space surrounded by a well-designed low maintenance rear yard with raised grass area great for the kids to play and edged with garden beds.
The family chef will love the Kitchen which provides full views of the main activity centre and boasts all the modern conveniences you would expect in a premium home with large benchtops, 900mm stove/oven, dishwasher as well as the ultimate butlers pantry. At the rear of the property is where you will find the other three generously sized bedrooms and second bathroom complete with bath, shower, single vanity and a separate toilet.
Save yourself the time and energy of building and simply step straight into this ultimate family home just a stones throw from the beaches of Curlewis which are the best kept secret of the Bellarine.
Call Josh today to learn more and book an inspection today.

Description:
Amazing Andale Abode
Just turn the key here at this brand-new property just waiting for you!
This 4-bedroom family home with 2 luxurious bathrooms will be sure to impress! Location is superb with a path to the beach, bridge across to the school & creek side walking tracks just meters from your front door. Grand wide entry as you step inside to high ceilings giving you the instant feeling of an abundance of space! Super large master bedroom is light filled completed by a lavish en-suite with floor to ceiling tiles, plus size shower with niches, dual shower head & stone top on the vanity. Open plan living is the central hub for the family with the stylish kitchen the statement piece offering a plethora of storage including a walk-in butlers style pantry, Caesarstone benches, stainless steel appliances including a 900 oven, 5 burner gas cook top, range hood & dishwasher. Dual sliding doors from the living area for easy access to the undercover alfresco & back yard which is a blank canvas for your gardening skills. Down the hall are bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 which all have built in robes. Accompanied by a central bathroom again with floor to ceiling tiles, deep bath perfect to soak your stresses away plus large shower with niches & dual heads. Additional features are internal access from the double lock up garage, down lights, Samsung refrigerated cooling & ducted heating, key lock windows, alarm system, tiled alfresco, tiled porch, side access & all sitting pretty on a 528m2 block in the very popular Curlewis! Walking distance to the school, shops, cafe, supermarket plus novelty shops and everything the Bellarine has to offer such as the bay, beaches, boat ramps, wineries & ferry services!

Description:
Meticulously Crafted Home In Curlewis Parks Estate
Residing on approx. 498sqm is this expertly crafted home which offers the pinnacle of low maintenance family living without compromising on quality and space. Surrounded by an array of premium homes, this sensational residence is situated only a short drive to some of the best schools the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
The open plan kitchen, living and dining area incorporates an abundance of natural sunlight that provides a seamless connection to the upstairs living area and additional bedrooms. Being a brand-new home, this property is ideal for those eligible for the Regional First Home Owners Grant who want to put their own personal touch on something ready to move into.
With the Tivoli Drive and Portarlington Road roadworks soon to be completed, access to Princess Freeway, Geelong CBD and everything in between will be quicker and easier than ever.
Master bedroom with full ensuite and w/in robe
Three additional bedrooms all with b/in robes
Exquisite open plan kitchen, living and dining area
Kitchen features stone benchtops, w/in pantry and s/steel appliances
Ducted heating throughout
Double remote lock up garage with rear and internal access
Great sized rear yard, perfect for kids and pets to play
Two points of side access to rear yard
Various landscaped parks and playgrounds a short walk away
20 minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical Gardens

Description:
Relocating Interstate - Must Sell
Just 3 years old & so much elegance personified here this Porter Davis 4 bedroom, 3 living areas and 2 car garage family home on a 525m2 block is just waiting for you! Master bedroom has a feature wall, tinted windows, full ensuite and a great size walk in robe. First living area is just perfect as a parents retreat as you look outside the window to garden views. Kitchen has stone benches, walk in pantry 900mm electric oven & gas 5 burner hotplates, range hood and dishwasher which are all stainless-steel appliances. Second living area is spacious with plenty of room for a dining table with sliding doors leading out to the undercover alfresco area featuring merbau decking. Third living area is down the back of the house just ideal for a kid's zone or teenager's hangout. Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 all have built in robes. Stylish bathroom has privacy blinds, a separate shower & deep bath. Walk in linen plus additional linen are adjacent to laundry with cupboards in the laundry for more storage. Out the back is a multipurpose shed plus segregated yards. One yard has a vegetable garden, bike shed, and garden shed. Yard two has immaculate landscaped gardens perfect to entertain, enjoy a spring or summers day and for kids to play. Plus, internal access to the garage, evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating and gorgeous light features there is nothing more you could want. With everything Curlewis has to offer, new shopping centre including Safeway, café, novelty shops, doctors & a 24-hour chemist. Just a short drive down the road is the bay, beaches, boat ramp, schools, ferry services and award-winning wineries, your Bellarine lifestyle starts here!

Description:
Cozy Family Favourite
Sure to impress, this 3 bedroom quality Dennis family home is a mere 3 years young in the popular Curlewis Parks Estate. Timber laminate floorboards greet you as you step inside with the first light filled living. Master bedroom has plantation shutters, ceiling fan, walk in robe & full en-suite, while the remaining 2 bedrooms both have built in robes that include shelving & drawers. Central bathroom perfectly positioned between the 2 bedrooms, offers a single vanity basin, separate shower & deep tiled in bath. Open plan 2nd living is ample with sliding doors out to the alfresco, kitchen equipped with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including a 900mm oven, gas 5 burner cook top, dishwasher & walk in pantry, all while over-looking a dining space. Backyard has all the fruit you could dream of with 2 apple, 2 nectarines, passionfruit, lemon, lime & orange trees and all visible from the hub of the home. Double lock up garage has internal access, while other additional features include; evaporative cooling, ducted heating & hanging pendant lights, all upon a 448m2 block. With just a short drive to local schools, supermarkets, cafes, 24 hour chemist & doctors clinic. Also, at your doorstep is everything the Bellarine lifestyle has to offer, including the boat ramp, cliff top bay walks, award winning wineries & ferry services.

Description:
Stylish Family Coastal Home
Behind the front door to this property there is a pleasant surprise. With a showroom presentation there are four double bedrooms, two living rooms and two bathrooms on offer and all on a quiet no through road in Curlewis. Situated five minutes from the beach, golf courses and wineries nearby, Curlewis Shopping Centre a short drive or walk and close to schools, parks and amenities. It is unsurpassable!
First things first with the master comprising of a walk-in robe and en suite with twin vanities, toilet and shower. Further along is the open-plan living, dining and kitchen hub. Equipped with an island stone bench, Electrolux double wall oven, Bellissimo five-burner stove top, LG dishwasher, built-in pantry and ample cabinetry. Up above there are highlight windows at the top of the cathedral ceilings providing plenty of natural sunlight.
Second lounge buds off this space with sliding doors leading to the back landscaped garden and established lawn. Ready to spark up for any occasion is a woodfire next to the outside, entertaining zone.
Three more bedrooms with built-in robes share a bathroom with a soaker tub, vanity and shower plus a separate toilet and laundry. A double lock-up garage provides secure vehicle parking and extra storage. Other features include ducted heating, split system, dimmer lights, solar heated hot water system, side gates and garden shed.
- Neutral tones throughout for a calm, coastal vibe
- Four double bedrooms and two living areas
- Double lock-up garage and outdoor entertaining zone
- All the modern comforts and stylish finishes
- 20 minutes away from the heart of Geelong
- Close to the water's edge, shops and schools

Description:
Savvy Buying Prime Location!!
Whether you are a first home buyer, investor or downsizer alike this home represents fantastic quality at such an affordable price! Location is paramount being on the doorstep of the Curlewis Shopping Centre, darted with shops, café, doctors & a 24-hour chemist. Not to mention at your fingertips public transport, local schools, boat ramp, bay, beaches, wineries & everything the Bellarine lifestyle has to offer.
This 12-month Geelong Home offers quality fittings and fixtures and has been fastidiously maintained. Comprising 3 bedrooms, the master with full ensuite, walk-in-robe and the reaming 2 bedrooms with built - in -robes. The heart of the home is the open plan kitchen/meals living area with sliding access to the yard. The designer kitchen includes stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, 900mm Westinghouse gas stove top and oven and soft close drawers. Bedrooms 2 and 3 are hosted by a central bathroom including deep spa bath, separate toilet and laundry.
The front yard is beautifully manicured with the bank yard presented as a low maintenance blank canvas, do as little or as much as you would like.
Features of the home include Rinnai gas heating and reverse cycle heating/cooling, double lock up garage with remote/ internal access, feature pendants, ceiling fans, niche boxes and timber floors.
You have the location, the quality and the room to improve all at such an affordable price!

Description:
Peaceful, Warm and Sunny
This home, on an elevated corner site overlooking the parklands of Pratt Reserve, is the pick of the bunch. It is sunny, low maintenance and features smart design making the most of its north facing orientation to boast a 90% energy efficiency rating.
The open plan living zone is a highlight. With direct access to outdoor entertaining and a kitchen that is both practical and good looking, hosting family and friends here is a breeze. A second living area provides a separate to unwind and works well as a media room with potential to create additional accommodation if required. There are three spacious bedrooms, including a master suite with en-suite, walk in robe and an expansive outlook; a family sized bathroom with separate shower; and plentiful storage throughout. An internal access garage and large shed are also included. The compact easy care garden offers the choice of sun filled or shaded spots to enjoy the outdoors.
Located in an established neighbourhood within a few minutes walk to parks and the local shopping centre, this property feels peaceful and tucked away. Yet all the essential amenities are within easy reach. As are the beautiful harbour and ocean beaches that make the Bellarine so popular. With Geelong just a short commute away and the ferry to Melbourne from Portarlington so close, you are never far from the action. Warm, family friendly or downsizer perfect, there is nothing to be done here but move in and enjoy.

Description:
CONTEMPORARY HOME WITH SIDE ACCESS
Situated in the thriving coastal town of Curlewis close to shops, cafes and amenities is this contemporary home which has been immaculately maintained and sits on approx 571m2 parcel of land. Featuring 3 generous bedrooms including master with WIR and ensuite and a delightful open plan kitchen, dining and living space flowing out to an undercover alfresco area ideal for summer entertaining. The kitchen features all the modern essentials including stone bench tops, dishwasher, 900mm freestanding oven and WIP. Built with attention to detail and featuring internal upgrades and a low maintenance garden this fantastic home represents a brilliant opportunity for the astute investor currently returning approx $1646 per calendar month or owner occupiers looking for a comfortable, modern home with easy access to the beach for boating, fishing and swimming. The home also features a double garage, ducted heating & split system for year round comfort and a driveway which is conveniently positioned with wide access and turning room for secure boat and caravan storage.

Description:
Walking Path to the Bay
Brand new turnkey property just waiting for you, here this 4-bedroom family home will be sure to impress! Location is everything with the walk path to the beach, bridge across to the school, creek side views and no through traffic all at your front door! Grand wide entry as you step inside to high ceilings giving an abundance of space! Large master bedroom is light filled with 5 windows completed by a lavish en-suite with floor to ceiling tiles, plus size shower with niches, dual shower head & black stone top on the vanity. Open plan living is the central hub for the family with the stylish kitchen the statement piece offering a plethora of storage, Caesarstone benches, stainless steel appliances including a 900 oven, 5 burner gas cook top, range hood & dishwasher.
Dual sliding doors from the living area for easy access to the undercover alfresco & back yard which is a blank canvas for your gardening skills. Down the hall are bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 which all have built in robes. Accompanied by a central bathroom again with floor to ceiling tiles, deep bath perfect to soak your stresses away plus large shower with niches & dual heads. Additional features are internal access from the double lock up garage, down lights, Samsung refrigerated cooling & ducted heating, key lock windows, alarm system, fly screens to operable windows, tiled alfresco, tiled porch & day/night blinds throughout. All sitting pretty on a 385m2 block in the very popular Curlewis! Walking distance to the school, shops, cafe, supermarket plus novelty shops and everything the Bellarine has to offer such as the bay, beaches, boat ramps, wineries & ferry services!

Description:
Unrivalled Excellence, Enviable Position
The Feel:
Exuding stunning street presence, this immaculate family home comes with all the great upgrades you could want in a brand new home, with everything done so you can enjoy the coastal lifestyle!
Natural stone and timber elements gift warmth and sophistication throughout, whilst open plan living is complemented by a gorgeous outdoor entertaining space, ideal for family events and BBQs.
The Facts:
-4BR family home with OP living and entertaining
-Striking freeform natural stone to modern coastal façade
-Set upon 523sqm a short 600m walk to Bayview Central
-Kitchen with feature stone tiling, 90cm ss apps. and WIP
-Huge OP living and dining flow to alfresco for entertaining
-Spacious master with pendant lighting, luxury ensuite and WIR
-Quietly positioned minor BRs fitted with BIRs
-Full height tiling, and semi-frameless glass to wet areas
-Timber flooring, heightened ceilings and LED lighting
-Gas ducted heating, SSAC to living and fans to all BRs
-Great OSP + remote DLUG with internal and rear access
-2nd driveway for boat/caravan with gated side access
-Landscaping features built-in seating and Japanese screening
-Easy access to Geelong CBD, with bus stop across the street
-10mins to surf beaches, award winning wineries and coastal towns
The Owner Loves:
“Curlewis is such a great area to live, we love the shops, beaches and bus to Geelong all being on our doorstep. All the natural finishes in this house makes it so cosy, and it’s been a great space to entertain.”

Description:
A Cut Above the Rest Affordable Luxury!
Bespoke quality and design, this home offers a unique footprint in the ever popular and growing Curlewis. This former GJ Gardener display home, no stone has been left unturned and expectations will be exceeded!
Landscaped gardens greet you as you step up to the Merbau deck to walk through the grand front door. The expansive master bedroom sits at the fore and offers garden views, luxe floor to ceiling sheer curtains & all complete with a full ensuite with his and hers vanity, oversized shower, toilet and walk-in-robe. The hub of the home offers an open plan living space with a cosy wood fire and sliding door access to the outside undercover area which offers seamless indoor/outdoor entertaining all year round. The kitchen which overlooks the dining is equipped with stone benches, 900mm electric oven with 5 burner gas cook top, dishwasher and ample storage, while a separate lounge offers a private and tranquil area complete with feature fire. The rear of the home hosts 3 spacious bedrooms, all with built-in-robes, a central bathroom with shower, vanity and a lush tiled in bath, separate toilet, fully equipped laundry with outdoor access and all complete with a versatile open 3rd living/study which also offers sliding doors to the undercover outdoor entertaining. The immaculate and low maintenance back garden offers the utmost privacy and is truly your own little oasis!
Additional features of the home include; gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, LED down lights, quality fixtures and fittings throughout, electric roller shutters on all large windows, bamboo floors, 5 Luca ceiling fans, alarm system, the extra security of a front fence and gate, while all complete with a DLUG with internal and external access.
This immaculate home sits pretty on a 437m2 block offering 26.4m2 of luxurious living. With all major amenities Curlewis has to offer, including the new shopping centre with Safeway, café, novelty shops, doctors & a 24-hour chemist and with the Bay, Boat Ramp, Golf Club, beaches, wineries and the newly introduced Portarlington Ferries all at your fingertips, don't miss this unique opportunity to secure such a stand out home.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Also available are Lots 1017 (adjoining) and Lot 1015. Call or email today for more information.

Description:
Position & Lifestyle
Presenting an outstanding opportunity to purchase two side by side blocks of land measuring approximately 376.9sqm and 405.9sqm respectively.
Set in one of the most sought after pockets of Curlewis, Bayview Estate, is this 376.9 (approx.) parcel of land. Situated only a short distance to the shopping centre, local schools and public transport.
A sought after location by many. Perfectly positioned, youll never want to leave. Whether you are thinking of building a single or multi level home, you will be sure to enjoy beautiful views all year round.
The Bellarine Peninsula offers prized access to many famous wineries plus the coastline's array of pristine beaches, walking trails and cultural delights. An increasingly popular lifestyle destination just 20 minutes to Geelong by car and daily ferry services to Melbourne CBD.
A great opportunity exists here to build your dream home, retire or make it your holiday home destination

Description:
Easy Living By The Bay
Bay views await you! This stunning Hotondo 3-bedroom family home will tick a lot off your checklist & is only 3 years young. First living/media area has street views & double doors to close off for segregation perfect to watch a movie or sports! Master bedroom is light filled with his & her walk in robes plus an en-suite with a separate toilet! The hallway offers you internal access from the double lock up garage. Step up just a few stairs to an open plan living zone that gives you bay views; here you can sit and enjoy ships that cruise through the channel daily from the dining table or lounge suite. Kitchen has stone benches, glass splash back, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, electric oven, gas 5 burner cook top, range hood & a walk in butler's style pantry. Bedrooms 2 & 3 are spacious & both have built in robes & serviced by a central bathroom that has a deep bath & separate shower. Outside is a fantastic undercover alfresco deck, landscaped gardens down the side & a grassed area perfect for kids & pets to play. In a quiet location at the end of a no through street. Additional features are cathedral ceilings, gas ducted heating, stone feature wall & gas log heater, 2 reverse cycle split systems, down lights & extra storage in the garage all on a 570m2 block. Just a 200-meter stroll to the beach & cliff top walks of Curlewis. With everything on offer such as new shopping centres, boat ramp, beaches, wineries and ferry services, make your move to the Bellarine today!

Description:
Coastal Lifestyle- Views
This elevated & titled allotment of 490m2 is sure to attract plenty of attention. It offers sweeping views of the surrounding countryside and even some bay views to the north. Affordable land is becoming a scarce commodity so don't hesitate to secure this lovely allotment for yourself. No restrictive covenants. This property sits in the middle of the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula and offers a lifestyle we used to only dream about. Dimensions of 14m X 35m. Call or email for more information or to make this land yours!

Description:
Effortless Lifestyle Choice
This solid brick and tile family sized home epitomizes modern easy living. With generous room sizes and 2.7m ceilings, this property has a spaciousness that further enhances livability.
Appealing to families and downsizers alike, the floor plan allows for zoned living. A sunny king sized master with en-suite and walk in robe is located towards the front of the property, while three additional bedrooms and a large bathroom are towards the rear.
The heart of the home is the open plan living area. It features a contemporary kitchen with extensive storage; a central island; quality appliances and a large walk in pantry. Undercover outdoor entertaining is easily accessed from the dining area. This is the perfect sheltered spot for enjoying evening BBQs and long lunches with friends and family. A second living space offers flexibility for use as a media room, playroom or as a formal lounge. There is ducted heating and cooling throughout with double glazed glass for all year round comfort.
Super easy care landscaping that almost takes care of itself with an automated watering system, means more of your time will be spent relaxing and making the most of living so close to all that the Bellarine offers. The double lock up garage (with rear door access to the garden) offers ample storage and the garden shed is an added bonus.
You will love the quiet, friendly and established neighbourhood as well as the short walk to shops, playgrounds and parks. Ocean beaches, the jetty, boating and fishing are all close by and Geelong is just a short commute away. This is truly low maintenance and effortless living in a great location.
Insights: 22 View Bella Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.
